thread.title: Eddie Lack Stretchered Off Ice After Getting Wrecked While Giving Up OT Goal
thread.title_full: Eddie Lack Stretchered Off Ice After Getting Wrecked While Giving Up OT Goal

author: Patrick Redford
title: Eddie Lack Stretchered Off Ice After Getting Wrecked While Giving Up OT Goal
text:
Go to permalink 
The Carolina Hurricanes lost in dramatic fashion tonight, falling 4-3 to the Red Wings in overtime. Hurricanes goalie Eddie Lack got flattened by Andreas Athanasiou as he scored the winner, and he had to be stretchered off the ice. 
The Hurricanes have yet to announce news of Lack’s condition, but Lack flashed a thumbs up as he left the ice. 
We’ll update this post when more information becomes available. Recommended Stories
